reasoning: Reporting incidence (new cases per 100k person-years). Classical Hodgkin's lymphoma is the most common form of Hodgkin lymphoma. Global incidence approximately 2.5 per 100k from GLOBOCAN 2005, with higher rates in developed countries (~3 per 100k) and lower rates in developing countries (~1-2 per 100k).
source: GLOBOCAN 2005 (International Agency for Research on Cancer)
